channel.title: Release command isnt working

item.title: Release command isnt working
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

hey guys danny here and i have a problem in a server i jailed myself to test it btw this isnt my server and i did ::release dannyman231 and it always says that name doesnt exist heres the command

if (command.startsWith("release") && playerRights > 0) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(5); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; writeLog(p.playerName+" unjailed by: "+playerName, "unjailed by"); p.toX = 3092; p.toY = 3492; p.action = 0; p.sM("You have been unjailed by " + playerName+ "!"); yell("[System Message]:" +p.playerName+" has been unjailed by "+playerName+"!"); sM("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+"."); } else { sM("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to unjail.."); } }
and heres the jail command if u need it

if (command.startsWith("jail") && playerRights > 0) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(5); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; writeLog(p.playerName+" jailed by: "+playerName, "jailed by"); if(p.playerRights < 2); p.toX = 2933; p.toY = 3285; p.action = 1; p.sM("You have been jailed by " + playerName); yell("[System Message]:" +playerName+" has jailed "+p.playerName+" "); sM("You have jailed "+p.playerName+"."); } else { sM("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to jail.."); } }

Read full topic
